channel.title: Configure Design Console on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Configure Design Console on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: a. Using Design Console with NGINX(non-SSL)
item.description: Configure an NGINX ingress (non-SSL) to allow Design Console to connect to your Kubernetes cluster. Prerequisites Setup routing rules for the Design Console ingress Create the ingress Update the T3 channel Restart the OIG domain Design Console client a. Using an on-premises installed Design Console b. Using a container image for Design Console Login to the Design Console

item.title: b. Using Design Console with NGINX(SSL)
item.description: Configure an NGINX ingress (SSL) to allow Design Console to connect to your Kubernetes cluster. Prerequisites Setup routing rules for the Design Console ingress Create the ingress Update the T3 channel Restart the OIG domain Design Console client a. Using an on-premises installed Design Console b. Using a container image for Design Console Login to the Design Console
